name: 2023 International Conference on Precision Engineering and Mechanical Manufacturing
content: Publication: Submitted Papers to the conference will be subjected to the rigorous peer-review process. Accepted and registered papers will be published in PEMM Conference Proceedings, which is indexed by Ei Compendex, Scopus, Conference Proceedings Citation Indexâ€”Science (CPCI-S) (Thomson Reuters, Web of Science), Chemical Abstracts etc.
